comments:
Driver:  http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/home/downloads/drops/TPTP-4.2.0-200603310100.html

- Start a fresh workspace
- Profile an arbitrary Java application
- Select the process and use its context menu to save it
- Close the profiling monitor view
- Re-open the view
- Delete the process
- Re-launch the process in profile mode
- Now try to select the process and select save from its context menu.

The problem is caused by the following NPE:
